description: "'Searching for America' is about looking for the kind of happiness that I felt as a child."
title: ROBIN KID’s Nostalgic Vision of the American Dream

description: "Our mission extends beyond recognition... we actively nurture artists, enabling them to expand their practices, pursue groundbreaking projects and deepen their technological engagement."
title: Gillian Varney On the Lumen Prize and Its Relevance After Thirteen Years

description: Human happiness will be A.I.'s "greatest reward," according to SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son.
title: SoftBank’s Masayoshi Son Says A.I. Will Soon Be 10,000 Times Smarter Than Humans

description: Three major works from the American businessman and philanthropist's personal collection will go on the block in next month's Modern Evening Auction.
title: Works from the Harry F. Guggenheim Collection Are Coming to Sotheby’s This November

description: "In France, I'm a little bit like the reasonable American. Here, I'm a little bit more the critical asshole French guy."
title: Jules de Balincourt Might Just Be Brooklyn’s Rousseau

description: Skip the big cities—Lyon and Marseille can wait. Instead, venture on a weekend getaway to one of the towns and villages that are the heart and soul of France, filled with their own regional flavors and flair.
title: The Best French Weekend Getaways from Paris
